transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji. Hello

Executive: Hello. Good afternoon sir. Main Gayatri Electrotech se baat kar rahi hoon. Hello.

Customer: Haan ji mam bataiye. Hello.

Executive: Haan ji mam bataiye. Awaaz aa rahi hai. Se Faizal sir se abhi baat hui meri. Humne abhi package renew karwaya hai na hamara IndiaMART ka.

Customer: Ek baar company ka naam batayenge mam?

Executive: Gayatri Electrotech.

Customer: Gayatri Electrotech. Ek minute.

Executive: Yes.

Customer: Mam Gayatri Enterprise hai?

Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello. Mam company ka naam aapne kya bataya Gayatri Enterprise?

Executive: Gayatri Electrotech Cooperative Private Limited.

Customer: Haan haan ji boliye. Gayatri Enterprise se haan ji ji. Uske naam se hai kya? Haan theek hai. Lekin uske regarding. Haan ji boliye boliye aap pehle. Awaaz aapki thodi break ho rahi hai. Profile design. Hello. Haan ji boliye. Nahi nahi aa rahi hai. Aa rahi hai clear. Bataye.

Executive: Abhi hamari profile design karna chalu hai na abhi.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Haan to uske regarding humne products vagera kya kya add karne hain uski price list kya rahegi wo maine Faizal sir ko bhej diya hai.

Customer: Okay. To uske regarding hume thoda training chahiye thi hamari matlab. Nahi abhi ek cheez main puchna chah raha hoon aapne kisko bheja hua hai? Ankit ko bheja hai kisko bheja hai aapne?

Executive: Faizal Faizal sir ko bheja hai maine sare. Nahi Faizal kaun ek baar batayenge kyunki abhi jo aapka Gayatri wala account handle kar rahe hain na ye aapke Ankit ji handle kar rahe hain. Aur ye Ankit ji se shayad aapka connect bhi hota hoga main ek baar agar number bataun aap check karenge Ankit aapka Gayatri wala. Kuch haan. Haan account manager aapke Ankit hi hai.

Executive: Haan lekin abhi unse baat nahi hui hai hamari. Hum abhi jinke sath deal deal final hui thi na Faizal sir se hi baat kar rahe hain hum abhi.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Faizal to okay. Hello. Haan ji mam. To phir ek baar aap apna awaaz aa rahi hai meri? Haan aapki aa rahi hai. Ek baar aap mere ko ek kaam kariye wo GST number ek baar aap batayenge kyunki aap new company ki baat kar rahi hai kyunki aapke jo yahan pe running hai na wo aapke Gayatri wo enterprises ke naam se hai.

Executive: Ek minute. Inke main number bata deta hoon primary number jo yahan pe registered registered hai 88 se start aapka number start hai.

Executive: Nahi nahi humne change karwaya tha na kal hi kal ya parso.

Customer: Wahi main bola ek baar aap mere ko wo bataye yahan pe apna GST number batana aapke company ka properly check kar lo kyunki abhi Ankit aapki company handle kar rahe hain us Digvijay owner Digvijay Prant Bhosle karke yahan pe pada hua hai owner ka name aur GST number jo hai wo GST number aapka ye wala main bata deta hoon ek baar 27 ES.

Executive: Ek minute main batati hoon aapko. Hello.

Customer: Hello. 2788

Customer: Ek minute.

Customer: 278833

Customer: 33

Executive: Hello. 33

Customer: Ji. G5

Customer: Ek minute G5

Customer: 68

Customer: 68

Customer: 8D

Customer: 8D

Customer: 1ZG

Customer: 1ZG

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Numbers to nahi aa raha hai.

Customer: Ek kaam aap ek baar apna number ek baar ispe wo boliye ek baar main aapke number pe ek baar hi bhejta hoon aap uspe bhejiye.

Executive: Kispe main kiske number pe?

Customer: Aap apna ek baar number bataye jisse call kar rahe hain main uspe whatsapp pe ek baar hi bhejta hoon aap uspe GST number dijiye.

Executive: 9850

Customer: 9850

Executive: 84

Customer: 84

Executive: 5870

Customer: 5870

Executive: 70 haan. 70. Theek hai maine hi karke bhijwaya hai aapke account manager ke number pe gaya hoga hi.

Executive: Haan. Aap usse ek baar wo GST jo bhi aap bole ek baar usse share kariye.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Dekhiye aaya kya?

Customer: Haan ji ek minute.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Haan boliye.

Customer: Ek minute mam.

Customer: Abhi mujhe mail aaya hai ki your ticket has now for your request.

Executive: Ji ji mam. Ye kya hai matlab?

Customer: Ye ticket aapka aapne 96 pe call kiya hua tha na abhi to is vajah se ticket open ho gayi thi kyunki aap abhi jo meri baat ho rahi hai 96 pe hi ho rahi hai aapki to is vajah se ticket open ho jata hai to Faizal jo hai wo hamare aap 96 pe customer care ke team wale hain.

Executive: Haan haan.

Customer: Theek hai aap ek kaam kariye jo number pe aapne maine aapko abhi edit karwana hai kya ek baar aap batayenge matlab kya images vagera aapko correct karwani thi apni properly?

Executive: Abhi mujhe matlab haan images humne product images bheje hain unko aur price list bhi bheji hai. To wo aapki team se haan upload karwa dijiye hamare profile pe aur hume training Friday ko chahiye.

Customer: Training okay training ke liye main ek kaam karta hoon aapke ek call ek arrange karwa deta hoon aap free hai na system vagera pe available hai?

Executive: Haan hoon main. Theek hai main ek kaam karta hoon aapke jo account manager hai main unko aapko bol ke ek video meeting schedule kara do aapko properly ek ek cheez guide kar denge kaise service vagera use karna hai.

Executive: Okay. Sir main kya bol rahi thi abhi hamari team thodi available nahi hai Friday ko aap available karenge na to sabhi team hamari available rahegi to kaise operating karna hai us tool ko app ko matlab to sabhi ko training mil jayegi isliye main bol rahi thi ki. Haan theek hai aap jo bhi jo bhi isko handle kare aap mere ko bata dijiyega main ek baar team ko bol ke usme proper aapko video meet pe guide kar denge bas aap time jaise aapne Friday bataya time aap Friday bata diya team available hai ki jo bhi isko handle karega IndiaMART main unko bol dunga proper usko ek ek cheez guide kar degi.

Executive: To main Friday ko bhi aapko hi call karu ya aap Ankit ji ka number denge. Nahi nahi us pe main ek kaam karta hoon wo to Ankit ko nahi aapka main account abhi Anisha ko de raha hoon Anisha aapke account handle karegi to main unke number pe aapko hi bhijwa deta hoon. Wo mail aaya hai unka number bhi hai shayad usme. Haan mail aaya haan Anisha Sharma wo aapka account abhi handle karengi main unko de raha hoon to aap unko number pe call kar lijiyega to wo aapko connect kar lenge main usme baki Anisha ko bol dunga. Okay. Haan Anisha ko bol deta hoon Friday ko aapko already connect kar lenge baki use hi uske numbers me hi bhi whatsapp pe bhijwa deta hoon bas. Theek hai sir wo aage ka communication Anisha dekhegi kya? Haan Anisha aapka account handle karengi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants profile designing to be started.

- Needs training on how to operate IndiaMART.

- Wants to upload product images and price list.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for GST number for verification.

- Executive offered to schedule a video meeting.

- Executive informed Anisha will handle the account.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share Anisha's contact details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile design, training, gst number, account manager
